description: Art Nouveau-esque image of three figures, one playing an instrument in UL; framed by vines and flowers; lettering around figures and down center of sheet; black and gray drawing and text on pale yellow sheet; bright yellow verso
provenance: Paul Maurer, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2019.
title: The Band, John Sebastian, Belaney and Bonnie, Butterfield Blues Band, Crow Muddy Waters, "Li'l Sun" Tony Glover, Midway Stadium, June 26,1971
